sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include">
    <sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <access>public</access>
        <active>true</active>
        <api_name>global.AssetManagementPerArrayRecordBaseJob</api_name>
        <caller_access/>
        <client_callable>false</client_callable>
        <description/>
        <name>AssetManagementPerArrayRecordBaseJob</name>
        <script><![CDATA[var AssetManagementPerArrayRecordBaseJob = Class.create();
AssetManagementPerArrayRecordBaseJob.prototype = Object.extendsObject(AssetManagementPerRecordBaseJob, {
    initialize: function() {
    },

    /* 
    Our predefined function for getting all of the unique domains for the records returned from the
    getRecords() function.
    */
    getDomainsGeneric: function() {
        var hashSet = {};
		var records = this.getRecords();
        for (var i = 0; i < records.length; i++) {
			var record = records[i];
			var recordDomainSysId = this.getDomainSysIdFromArrayRecord(record);
			if (!hashSet[recordDomainSysId]) {
				hashSet[recordDomainSysId] = true;
			}
		}
        return Object.keys(hashSet);
    },

    /*
	Overriding the abstract method getDomains()
	*/
	getDomains: function() {
		throw 'You must implement the getDomains function when extending AssetManagementPerArrayGlideRecord!';
	},

    /*
    Implement parent function. Run jobs for records.
    If domain separation is enabled, query records for current domain before run job for each record.
    */
    runJob: function() {
        var records = this.getRecords();
        var isFailed = false;
		
		for (var i = 0; i < records.length; i++){
			var record = records[i];
			try{
				if(this.fIsDomainDataSeparationEnabled){
					var recordDomainSysId = this.getDomainSysIdFromArrayRecord(record);
					if(recordDomainSysId === this.getCurrentDomainSysId()){
						this.runJobForRecord(record);
					}
				}else{
					this.runJobForRecord(record);
				}
			} catch(e) {
				isFailed = true;
				gs.logError(this.type + ': ' + e);
			}
		}
		
        if (isFailed) {
            throw this.type + ': Failed to run job. Please look into logs for more details.';
        }
    },
	
	/* 	
	Abstract method for getDomainSysIdFromArrayRecord. Any class extending this job needs to override this method.	
	*/	
	getDomainSysIdFromArrayRecord: function(current) {
		throw 'You must implement the getDomainSysIdFromArrayRecord function when extending AssetManagementPerArrayGlideRecord!';	
	},
    type: 'AssetManagementPerArrayRecordBaseJob'
});]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2019-07-31 19:57:47</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>3e6e6ee07307330012a9e5e7caf6a73a</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>5</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_name>AssetManagementPerArrayRecordBaseJob</sys_name>
        <sys_package display_value="Asset Management" source="com.snc.asset_management">0ea009c76d2620100acb70b353433049</sys_package>
        <sys_policy>protected</sys_policy>
        <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope>
        <sys_update_name>sys_script_include_3e6e6ee07307330012a9e5e7caf6a73a</sys_update_name>

        <u_script_length>2117</u_script_length>
    </sys_script_include>
</record_update>
